name: Keren Kilgore
what_you_do: At Quantum Shift Media, Keren Kilgore helps authors, coaches, speakers, and business owners write, publish, and market fiction and nonfiction books that align with their deepest truth and professional purpose—transforming them into powerful business assets that grow visibility, impact, and income.

social_proof: certified Mastery of Self Facilitator trained in the Transformational Meditation™ Model developed by the International Academy of Self-Knowledge
signature_programs: 28-Day Mastery of Self Intensive, 90-Day Book Launch Blueprint
business_focus: Helping authors, coaches, speakers, and business owners write, publish, and market books that align with their purpose and grow their business.
service_provided: book coaching, book design, publishing, author branding, marketing campaigns, Mastery of Self Intensive, 90-Day Book Launch Blueprint
